summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SmartStore onboarding wizard with new Choose Plan step. All features working perfectly including 4-step flow, plan selection, comparison modal, and navigation between pages.
passed_tests: Choose Plan page loads at /onboarding/choose-plan with title 'Choose your plan' and subtitle 'Start small and upgrade anytime.'
Progress bar shows 4 steps: Choose Plan (active), Store Details, Connect Marketplace, Review & Sync
Step counter shows 'Step 1 of 4'
4 plan cards displayed: Free ($0/month), Silver ($29/month), Gold ($79/month), Platinum ($199/month)
Gold plan card has 'Most Popular' badge visible
Each plan card shows 4 feature bullets (Products, Marketplaces, Order sync, Support)
Continue button is disabled when no plan is selected
Clicking a plan card highlights it with selection indicator (checkmark)
Continue button becomes enabled after selecting a plan
Clicking Continue navigates to /onboarding/store-details
Compare plans link opens modal with feature comparison table
Compare modal shows 10 features across 4 plans with check/cross icons
Compare modal close button works correctly
Clicking modal backdrop closes modal
Helper text 'You can change your plan later from Settings.' is visible
Store Details page shows 'Step 2 of 4' with Choose Plan done in progress bar
Store Details page Back button navigates to /onboarding/choose-plan
Connect Marketplace page shows 'Step 3 of 4'
Review page shows 'Step 4 of 4' with all previous steps done
Review page has plan summary card showing 'Gold' badge and '$79/month'
Review page plan card has 'Change' link navigating to /onboarding/choose-plan
Signup form navigates to /onboarding/choose-plan (not store-details)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Plan selection visual feedback works with border highlighting
Modal backdrop and close button both work to close Compare Plans modal
Progress bar correctly shows completed steps with checkmarks
Step navigation updates correctly throughout the flow
All plan pricing and feature information displays correctly
Gold plan 'Most Popular' badge appears in both card view and comparison table
